trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Buenos Aires
There were no other sightings in Buenos Aires on or around February 6th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWent to my home in a taxi, while I was checking my digital camera. Suddenly I looked toward the sky and scope to see a very bright object that it was moving at an astonishing speed. The camera shot and captured a big and strange UFO. The object changed shape as he moved quickly and made a 90 degree turn and disappeared. Later, when reviewing the photo on my computer, I could distinguish several little white objects around the big one. The entire episode lasted about 5 seconds.
